<h1 align="center">
  My CV
</h1>

Small project to learn a bit about Gatsby and React, while having fun with one of my best friends during his FE learning journey.

## How to Run the project locally

1.  **Clone this repository**

    Run the following command on an empty new folder

    ```sh
    git clone https://github.com/carlosbvz/carlosbvz.git
    ```

2.  **Make sure to set up your local environment**

    This project has several dependencies, please make sure to have them on your machine:

    - [nodejs](https://nodejs.org/es/download/) (I use node/11.12.0 v)
    - [gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/docs/quick-start)


3.  **Install all needed npm modules**

    Run the following command on your root folder:
    ```sh
    npm install
    ```

4.  **Install all needed npm modules**

    Start the local develop environment:
    
    ```
    gatsby develop
    ```

For more information about the different environments and gastby in general, please review [gatsby quick start section](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/docs/quick-start)
